Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: VarunaX browser OS - First Sprint

## Summary
- Add design tokens with light-green palette \(IBM Plex Sans, JetBrains Mono\)
- Implement window manager with dock, menu bar, and app launcher
- Add Dexter financial data client with mock data
- Implement paper trading system with position sizing
- Add CI workflow with Vitest tests

## New Packages
- @varunax/design-tokens: CSS variables and design system
- @varunax/window-manager: OS shell components
- @varunax/dexter: Financial research client
- @varunax/trading: Paper trading system

## Test Results
- 8 tests passing \(trading store\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

### Migration

### Paper Trading

- Position sizing calculator

- Audit logging
